deshapalakayange thanathuru idiriyata ‘hitapu’ yana yeduma bhawitha keruna da kalakaruwaku kala kariyaka wenuwen ema yeduma bhawitha wanne natha.kumara siriwardhanakarthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha

uuranta mona saukhyada kiyanawa wage api wage ashilachara purudu walin wahila hitapu kattiyakata muge me hasirima hari prashnayak una.

paksha prathi sanwidhanayedi eksath jathika pakshaye mahalekam dhuraya sandaha adhyapana amathya akila wiraj kariyawasam mahatha path kirimatath niyojya mahalekam dhuraya sandaha aluthma muhunak idiripath kirimatath thiranaya wi thibena bawa eksath jathika paksha aaranchi marga sandahan karayi.

hemmathagama polis niladharin kshnikawa adala weda soya hemmathagama nagaraya wimarshanaya karaddi hemmathagama pradhana bas nawathumen mawanalla haraha kalmune dakwa yamata sudanam basayak paminena thek bala siti mema pudgalaya athadanguwata gena adhikaranayata idiripath kara thibini.
hambanthota waraye upaya margika wadagathkama:
apage hela ithihasayedi, hela yakunge hondama mithura gana kadima pahadili kirimak apage hithawathek wana "nuthana deshamamakaya" blog karu wisin kara thibe.
onna ethakota mathak une api inna dawas wala rusiyanu chithrapati ulelak karapu hati.

kiyala kiyana debasak danda.ithin eekata ethana hitapu api kipa denek hina unata kellanta ehema therune na.eka kellek eeke thiyena hasyaya mokakda kiyala ahuwama onna kollek ee gana kiyala dunna.ee kiyanne weralu malwala suwanda hariyata shukra tharalayen ena gandhayata bohoma samanayi kiyala pahadili kalama ara kella kiyanawa,
eyada sikurage niwedanayaki.
habayi me kiyanna yanne api niwasedi sada ganna samanya kopi koppayata eha giya “kopi kalawa” ganayi.
kawuruth ayi kiyalawath ahuwe na.
ubath machan onlayin sto 1000000000000k thibbath wadak naha uba katin kiyanawa witharane
eyage thaththa hitiyeth eya ekka nisa niwadu dawas walata api awidinnath giya lassana than balanna.eyage ammata wagema mage ammatath salakana kenek una eka mata loku sanasimak una.
habayi ape unge katawal honda nahane.
kalin yojana kara thibu pinbima haraha diwena margayata eka niwasak pamanayi, iwath kirimata niyamithawa thibune.
” dan apita thibenne janadhipathiwaranaya dinanna.
supurudu mulawakata apa hasuwa atha.
eheth, ese nokerenne aarthika sadhaka haras wana bawini.

meken apita pahadili wenawa aandu balayata pathwennema aandu peraliyen passe athiwena arbudayak athulema thiyagena kiyala. 1994 di podujana eksath peramuna balayata pathwuna awasthaweth me wage thaththwayak thibuna.

obath ee kalliye pa්rabala samajikayek neda?‘kalliyak’ kiyana wachanaya athiwenna hethu wune ee hitapu aya ge jiwana darshanaya, sahithya darshanaya ekak wu nisayi.mahacharya ediriwira sarachchandrayan ge asura obe nirmana jiwithaya kerehi balapawe koyi aakarayata da?ee dawaswala peradeni wishwa widyalayaye chinthana aadhipathya daragena hitiye mahacharya sarachchandra yi.mama ohu ithama kittuwen aasha්raya kala.

kese wethath athithaye janma kendraya hondin pariksha kara bala ee ee asuba pala mangahara, suba pala wada wardhanaya wana aakarayata nam thabima ho namata akurak niyama kirima sidukalada ada pariganakaya idiriye siyallama thiranaya kerena thaththwayak uda boho durata siduwanne nawina wattoruwakata aruthsun eheth nawina pannaye namak athulath kirimayi.

aththama kiwwoth plen wala yanna thiyena aasawata wada sabmarin ekaka yanna mara aasawak mata thiyenne.plen eke yanna thibba aasawa senna ayiya kude kudu karala dammane eyage post eken…
ese nam nawa rajaye aayathanawalata pathkerenne kawuda yannath me wanawita pahadili wanu atha.
manda mona purasaram deduwath, me rate bhauthika sampath thiya niyamakaraye minis sampathwath nathi nisath.
deka wasara palamu waraya bawa ma hata mathakaya.

meya nalinita mahath paluwak ha aduwak men danennata wiya.inda hita ho gamanak bimanak yamata ho pedrikta katha kala da ohuta rakiyawe aniwarya bawa nisa hewath eeta idakadak nathi nisa “mata baha nalini mata wada thiyenawa” yi age illim pa්rathikshepa karayi.biriya saha daruwan samanga santhoshayen tika welawak gatha kala yuthu yayi samahara witeka sithu pedrik ee sandaha welawak wen kara gena niwasata paminiya da rohalen ho paudgalika rohalakin labena durakathana amathumak nisa asadhya rogiyaku wenuwen ohuta waha ma niwasin pitathwa yamata siduwiya.rogin wenuwen kapa wi katayuthu kirima waidyawarayaku ge parama yuthukama bawa saba namuth tharuna biriyaka ge aadarayata, sithum pathumwalata eya uththarayak nowana bawa pedrik sihipath kale natha.diyaniyan dedena nositinnata nalini ge jiwithayath, niwasath paluwata giya ambalamak se ayata danennata wiya.diyaniyan dedenath biriyath thaman ge eka ma wasthu sampath yayi pedrik sitha sitiya da ohuta waidya wruththiye wagakim, ha bandunu rogin pilibanda karunika manushyathwayen midennata awasthawak labune da natha.diyaniyan dedena pasal giya pasuwa sithata danena paluwa ha thanikama manga harawa ganimata nalini hithawath mithuriyan ge asura patha niwasin pita wi yannata huru purudu wuwa ya.dan dan labena wiwekayen the tikak bonnata, aahara gannata, wathura tikak na gannata sitha pedrik niwasata pamini boho awasthawala nalini niwase nomathi wuwa ya.
ahas ganga galanne paradisayata piwisena patu doratuwa wetha ya.
